definition: the action of prohibiting or inhibiting or forbidding (or an instance thereof)
details:
noun
- the action of prohibiting or inhibiting or forbidding (or an instance thereof)
= synonyms: prohibition
- (psychology) the conscious exclusion of unacceptable thoughts or desires
= synonyms: suppression
- the quality of being inhibited
- the process whereby nerves can retard or prevent the functioning of an organ or part
= example: the process whereby nerves can retard or prevent the functioning of an organ or part
